name: PLOV
directions: Add the two oils and let it get superheated until the smoke comes out
Add the meat and let it fry
After the meat gets dark brown, add the onions and let it fry more
Add the thinly sliced carrots on top of the meat and make sure it fully covers the meat
Then add the raisins along with salt, pepper, and cumin
Let them fry until soft with the lid covered
After, add the washed rice on top of the carrots with water until it covers the rice fully and cover the lid
Once the rice is soft, the food is ready.
description: This National Dish is easy and delicious. Plov is a dish that is classic and usually served on holidays and to guests. This dish brings people together and is a favorite for many Central Asians.

name: SAMBUSA
directions: Mix the flour, water, egg, olive oil, pinch of salt into a big bowl until it forms into a ball of dough
Break into 4 smaller balls and set
While the dough sets, mix together your ground beef, diced onions, salt, pepper, cumin, and a bit of olive oil together and mix
Take one ball of the dough and roll evenly on all sides until it's so flat and stretched it's see-through
Take your melted butter and spread evenly all throughout the dough
Roll the dough up from bottom to top very closely, no air should be stuck in between
Once it's long, stretch it a little more, but prevent it from ripping
Cut 1-inch pieces and stick them in the fridge
Repeat that process with the rest of the doughs
Once the dough pieces from the fridge get a tad bit hard enough the butter doesn't melt, roll them out trying not to lose the flower circular lines within the middle until it's 2 cm thick
Using your spoon, scoop out the meat onto the dough and close using all four sides making it into a square
Place on the pan and finish with egg yolks on top for color and some sesame seeds, into the preheated oven at 350 degrees Fahrenheit until the top and bottom become golden brown
description: This popular dish is loved by many Central Asians. You can find the Mantu dish on special occasions or large gatherings or any day of the year. This is a traditional meal the whole family will enjoy.

name: SHASHLIK/KEBABS
directions: Add everything into a mixing bowl and mix them together
Put small patches of meat through the skewers, thin
Freeze for thirty minutes
Once the barbeque coal is ready, place the skewers on top and cook until brown and almost hard
Serve with freshly cut onions on top and the kebabs are ready
description: This is a popular picnic pick across Central Asia. Shashlik is a delicious appetizer that is often served in restaurants and picnics.

name: SHURBO SOUP
directions: Boil the meat in a separate pot. Once it boils for a good 20 minutes, throw out the meat water and wash the meat
In a big pot bring water to boil
Add your meat, chopped up carrots, red pepper, onions
Let that cook for at least an hour on low heat
Add the potatoes along with salt, pepper to taste and a teaspoon of vegeta
After the potato is soft, your soup is ready.
Add some cilantro to your bowl and chickpeas and the dish is complete.
description: This is a traditional, light, vegetable soup in Central Asia. Shurbo is a common healthy meal that can be a break from other heavy dishes.

name: BICHAK
directions: After mixing the flour, water, pinch of salt, olive oil, set aside for half an hour
Dice the onions and greens and mix them together with olive oil, salt and pepper
Make three inch square cuts of the dough after rolling it flat
Add a spoonful of the greens mix
Cover the bottom flat
Grease the bottom of pans and put in the bichak to the preheated oven at 350F until the top has become golden brown
description: This is a popular stuffed baked or fried pastry. Bichaks are puffy, flaky and can be shaped in triangles, circles or quadrangles which make them unique.

name: CHIBUREK
directions: Add the flour, hot water, oil, egg, salt together in a bowl and mix until formable into a ball
Add the ground beef into a bowl and season with salt, pepper, paprika and mix along with diced onions
Cut 4 inch circles of dough and add the seasoned meat inside, fold and press tightly on the ends
Heat the oil and add the chiburek
Cook until golden brown on medium heat
description: This fried pastry is delicious and a popular street food. Chiburekis are simple and easy to make. They can be a light snack or a restaurant meal.

name: KURUTOB
directions: Chop the 2 onions thinly and use 1 Â½ onions to fry with the butter until golden brown
Make salad with the tomatoes, cucumbers and half the onions with some parsley. Season with pepper and salt and mix
Rip apart the bread into small 1-inch pieces and scatter them around a large family plate
After the fried onions are done, add that on top of the bread along with the liquid Labneh sour cream on top
Then finish it with the salad and you're ready to present
description: This is a creamy mix of vegetables and flatbread. Kurutob is a popular Central Asian cuisine that takes a step away from meat-filled meals. A special ingredient, qurut makes this meal special.
